sentences.en: a collision between the two countries over fishing rights
sentences.cn: 两国为捕鱼权而发生的冲突

sentences.en: Certain truck gasoline tanks can rupture and burn in a collision.
sentences.cn: 某些卡车的油箱在碰撞时可能发生爆裂并起火。

sentences.en: He died in the car collision with his skull fractured.
sentences.cn: 他在那次撞车事件中因头骨碎裂而死去.

sentences.en: He heard tires squeal as the car braked to avoid a collision.
sentences.cn: 为避免相撞而刹车时，他听到了轮胎与地面刺耳的摩擦声。

sentences.en: He said it was true that a collision had happened.
It's the collision of disparate ideas that alters one's perspective.
sentences.cn: 是迥然不同的观点之间的碰撞改变了人们的看法。

sentences.en: The back of the car was badly dented in the collision.
sentences.cn: 汽车尾部被撞后严重凹陷。

sentences.en: The car was a worthless wreck after the collision.
sentences.cn: 撞车以后,那辆车成了毫无价值的残骸.

sentences.en: The car was wrecked by its collision with a big lorry.
sentences.cn: 这辆小轿车是由于和大卡车相撞而碰毁的.

sentences.en: The collision took place in the busiest shipping lanes in the world.
sentences.cn: 撞船事故发生在全世界最繁忙的航道上。

sentences.en: The front and rear of the car will crumple during a collision.
sentences.cn: 碰撞时，汽车的前部和后部会被撞瘪。

sentences.en: The two communities are now on a collision course.
sentences.cn: 这两个社区之间现在有可能会发生冲突。

sentences.en: There is an asteroid on a collision course with the Earth.
sentences.cn: 有一颗小行星可能会与地球发生碰撞。

sentences.en: They were on their way to the airport when their van was involved in a collision with a car.
sentences.cn: 他们正往机场赶路的时候，其货车和一辆小汽车相撞了。

sentences.en: This collision had a very unusual cause.
sentences.cn: 这次冲突有着非同寻常的原因.

sentences.en: Two people were killed in a head-on collision (= between two vehicles that are moving directly towards each other ) on highway 218.
sentences.cn: 218号公路上有两辆汽车迎面相撞，两人死亡。

sentences.en: Who was at the helm when the collision occurred?
sentences.cn: 当碰撞发生时,谁在掌舵?

phrases.tran_cn: 碰撞事故；空中相撞事故
导致冲突的轨迹；碰撞航向
向导致碰撞的方向运行

trans.tran_en: an accident in which two or more people or vehicles hit each other while moving in different directions
